subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Carlos Alberto Parreira, Brazil's coach, and a number of players seemed shocked after the sluggish defeat, in which Brazil did not play with its accustomed flair for long stretches.
snippet: Carlos Alberto Parreira, Brazil's coach, and a number of players seemed shocked after the sluggish defeat, in which Brazil did not play with its accustomed flair for long stretches.
